com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.concept_expansion.v1
Class ConceptExpansion

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService
      com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.concept_expansion.v1.ConceptExpansion

public class ConceptExpansion
extends WatsonService

The Concept Expansion service analyzes text and interprets its meaning based on usage in other similar contexts.

Version:
v1
Author:
German Attanasio Ruiz (germanatt@us.ibm.com)
See Also:
Concept Expansion
